meanings.sent1: The forest looked mistier as the evening approached.
meanings.sent2: The mountain peak appeared mistier as the clouds rolled in.
meanings.sent3: The mistier landscape made it hard to see the path ahead.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of the past grew mistier with each passing year.
meanings.sent5: The mistier air created a dreamy atmosphere in the valley.

meanings.definition: Having a vague or unclear appearance
meanings.sent1: The mistier details of the painting left viewers puzzled.
meanings.sent2: His explanation became mistier as he tried to clarify it.
meanings.sent3: The mistier instructions led to a lot of confusion among the students.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts became mistier as she tried to recall the events.
meanings.sent5: The mistier outline of the figure made it hard to identify.

meanings.definition: To become obscured by mist or fog
meanings.sent1: The view mistier as the fog rolled in from the sea.
meanings.sent2: The city skyline mistier as the morning mist settled.
meanings.sent3: The mirror mistier as she breathed on it to clean.
meanings.sent4: The future mistier as the uncertainty loomed ahead.
meanings.sent5: The road mistier as the dense fog enveloped the surroundings.
